attributes.action: Start a national drug enforcement agency-dedicated to tackling drugs.
attributes.additional_details: The underfunded and understaffed police and border agency simply cannot cope. Violent crime and anti social behaviour is up, and County Lines drug dealing/supply is rife. This will only get worse. Fear of crime is at its highest.
attributes.background: Drug use, possession, dealing and supply is rife amongst communities. It has countless consequences including contribution to crime and disorder, exploitation, and prays on the vulnerable. Start a drug enforcement agency that the world is proud of. Put more funding into tackling drugs.

rejection.details: The National Crime Agency, which investigates serious and organised crime, already takes action to tackle drug trafficking. You can find out more about this work here: https://nationalcrimeagency.gov.uk/what-we-do/crime-threats/drug-trafficking
